p: As regards previous MERS and SARS outbreaks, to our knowledge no data are available regarding clinical course and sequelae in pediatric patients. On the other hand vaccination against H1N1 virus was not associated with increased risk of islet autoimmunity or type 1 diabetes, and in a group of Italian patients we did not report an increased risk of hospitalization due to H1N1 infection in pediatric patients with type 1 diabetes [43].
